verre2ouiski.name: §l§k§2!!!§r §aVerre2OuiSki §l§k§2!!!§r
verre2ouiski.description:
Cape of the great and wonderful creator of this plugin
Verre2OuiSki !

mojang.name: New Mojang Cape
mojang.description: All Mojang AB employees have Mojang logo capes. This design has been used since October 7, 2015.

christmas_cape.name: Christmas Cape
christmas_cape.description: On December 24/25, 2010, all users were shown with this Christmas tree cape. This cape was not added to user accounts.

xbox_birthday_cape.name: Xbox Birthday Cape
xbox_birthday_cape.description: From May 9 to May 13, 2013, all players of the Xbox 360 Edition were shown with this birthday cake cape to celebrate the 1st birthday of the Xbox edition of Minecraft.

mojira_moderator_cape.name: Mojira Moderator Cape
mojira_moderator_cape.description: This cape was given to the Bug Tracker Moderators on December 25, 2014, and again from May 9, 2016 onwards.

turtle_cape.name: Turtle Cape
turtle_cape.description: This cape was given to 'billyK_' for suggesting Mojang adds turtles to the game.

migrator_cape.name: Migrator Cape
migrator_cape.description: This cape will be given out to players who migrate their Mojang account to Microsoft account system.

gr8_escapes_cape.name: Gr8_Escape's Cape
gr8_escapes_cape.description: This cape was given to Gr8_Escape. The account is owned by a Mojang employee leading the work on minecraft.net
